description: Angular component 'NoteModalComponent' that provides a modal dialog interface for creating and updating notes, handling form input, validation, and interactions with NotesService.

classes.name: NoteModalComponent
classes.description: An Angular standalone component for note creation and editing, with input for existing note data and output for modal closure events.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component; copies input note data to internal state if present.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Validates the note title; determines whether to create or update a note.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Calls the NotesService to create a new note and handles success or error responses.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Calls the NotesService to update an existing note and handles success or error responses.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Emits a close event indicating cancellation without saving.
